subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Muguruza, a 21-year-old Spaniard seeded 20th, beat 15th-seeded Timea Bacsinszky, 7-5, 6-3, to secure a spot in the final four of a Grand Slam event for the first time.
snippet: Muguruza, a 21-year-old Spaniard seeded 20th, beat 15th-seeded Timea Bacsinszky, 7-5, 6-3, to secure a spot in the final four of a Grand Slam event for the first time.
